channel.title: what is the meaning of Current Friend Rankings?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "what is the meaning of Current Friend Rankings?"

item.title: Re: what is the meaning of Current Friend Rankings?
item.content:encoded: You earn 'friend points' when you use an ally. If you're #1 (or in some cases #2 as well) in the friend point rankings, you get to 'hang out' with that ally for the day. This allows you to learn their jutsu for half cost, for you to use any jutsu they teach for zero chakra cost, and to get allies like Nadeshiko, the Floating on Air Theme, or the Trade Lvl. 2.

item.title: what is the meaning of Current Friend Rankings?
item.content:encoded:
what is the meaning of Current Friend Rankings?
is it how god any ally is?how do you read it anyway?
